amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for any family who is not an elderly family or a disabled family and who was not receiving tenant-based rental assistance under section 8 of such Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for any family who is not an elderly family or a disabled family and who was not receiving tenant-based rental assistance under section 8 of such Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A078) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A078) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Grothman.
